siteOverview.title: Site Overview
siteOverview.description: This website consists of 22 pages with the following structure and characteristics:

performanceConsiderations.title: Performance Considerations
performanceConsiderations.description: Consider these performance metrics when rebuilding the website:
recommendations: Optimize page load performance to improve user experience
Reduce First Contentful Paint time to under 1 second
Optimize Largest Contentful Paint to under 2.5 seconds
Reduce Total Blocking Time to improve interactivity

tasks: Create a new project directory
Initialize the project with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files
Set up the folder structure for assets, components, and pages
Install necessary dependencies
steps.title: 1. Project Setup
steps.description: Set up the development environment and project structure

tasks: Download or recreate all CSS files
Download or recreate all JavaScript files
Collect all images, fonts, and other media assets
Organize assets in the appropriate directories
steps.title: 2. Asset Collection
steps.description: Gather and organize all required assets

tasks: Create the header component
Create the navigation component
Create the footer component
Develop any sidebar components
Build card and form components
Implement any custom components specific to the site
steps.title: 3. Component Development
steps.description: Build reusable components identified in the analysis

tasks: Create the homepage with appropriate layout and components
Develop secondary pages following the site hierarchy
Implement responsive design for all pages
Ensure consistent styling across the site
steps.title: 4. Page Construction
steps.description: Build individual pages using the components

tasks: Implement navigation and routing
Add form validation and submission handling
Implement any interactive elements (sliders, accordions, etc.)
Add any required API integrations or data fetching
steps.title: 5. Functionality Implementation

tasks: Test the site across different browsers and devices
Optimize images and assets for performance
Implement performance best practices
Ensure accessibility compliance
Validate HTML and CSS
steps.title: 6. Testing and Optimization
steps.description: Test the site and optimize performance

tasks: Bundle and minify assets
Configure appropriate caching strategies
Set up any required server configurations
Deploy the site to the hosting environment
steps.title: 7. Deployment

reconstructionInstructions.title: Reconstruction Instructions
reconstructionInstructions.description: Follow these steps to rebuild the website with maximum fidelity:
